verses.verse: וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <WH6213> did בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> of Midian שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַתָּ֥עָז <WH5810> prevailed יַד־ <WH3027> And the hand מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> of Midian עַל־ <WH5921> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel מִפְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> [and] because מִדְיָ֜ן <WH4080> of the Midianites עָשֽׂוּ <WH6213> made לָהֶ֣ם ׀ בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְהָרוֹת֙ <WH4492> them the dens אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> which [are] in the mountains וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּעָר֖וֹת <WH4631> and caves וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּצָדֽוֹת׃ <WH4679> and strong holds

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> it was אִם־ <WH518> when זָרַ֣ע <WH2232> had sown יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> And [so] it was when Israel וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> came up מִדְיָ֧ן <WH4080> that the Midianites וַֽעֲמָלֵ֛ק <WH6002> and the Amalekites וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children קֶ֖דֶם <WH6924> of the east וְעָל֥וּ <WH5927> even they came up עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> against

וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> And they encamped עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> against וַיַּשְׁחִ֙יתוּ֙ <WH7843> against them and destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> יְב֣וּל <WH2981> the increase הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth עַד־ <WH5704> thou בּוֹאֲךָ֖ <WH935> till thou come עַזָּ֑ה <WH5804> unto Gaza וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <WH7604> and left מִֽחְיָה֙ <WH4241> no sustenance בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> for Israel וְשֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> neither sheep וָשׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> nor ox וַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <WH2543> nor ass

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for הֵם֩ <WH1992> with וּמִקְנֵיהֶ֨ם <WH4735> with their cattle יַעֲל֜וּ <WH5927> For they came up וְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH168> and their tents [יָבֹאוּ כ] (וּבָ֤אוּ <WH935> came ק) כְדֵֽי־ <WH1767> as אַרְבֶּה֙ <WH697> grasshoppers לָרֹ֔ב <WH7230> for multitude וְלָהֶ֥ם וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1581> [for] both they and their camels אֵ֣ין <WH369> were without מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> were without number וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and they entered בָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <WH7843> to destroy

וַיִּדַּ֧ל <WH1809> impoverished יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> And Israel מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> was greatly מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> of the Midianites וַיִּזְעֲק֥וּ <WH2199> cried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when זָעֲק֥וּ <WH2199> cried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And it came to pass when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַ֖ל <WH5921> on אֹד֥וֹת <WH182> because מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of the Midianites

וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> That the LORD אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> a נָבִ֖יא <WH5030> prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> which said לָהֶ֜ם כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I הֶעֱלֵ֤יתִי <WH5927> I brought you up אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> from Egypt וָאֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> and brought you forth אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> out of the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> of bondage

וָאַצִּ֤ל <WH5337> And I delivered אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> you out of the hand מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וּמִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> and out of the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of all לֹחֲצֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3905> of all that oppressed וָאֲגָרֵ֤שׁ <WH1644> you and drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> from before וָאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> you and gave לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> you their land

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> And I said לָכֶ֗ם אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto you I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תִֽירְאוּ֙ <WH3372> fear אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> not the gods הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> ye dwell בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> in whose land וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> but ye have not obeyed בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> my voice פ

וַיָּבֹ֞א <WH935> And there came מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> an angel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> and sat תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> under הָֽאֵלָה֙ <WH424> under an oak אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּעָפְרָ֔ה <WH6084> which [was] in Ophrah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לְיוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> that [pertained] unto Joash אֲבִ֣י הָֽעֶזְרִ֑י <WH33> the Abiezrite וְגִדְע֣וֹן <WH1439> Gideon בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> and his son חֹבֵ֤ט <WH2251> threshed חִטִּים֙ <WH2406> wheat בַּגַּ֔ת <WH1660> by the winepress לְהָנִ֖יס <WH5127> to hide מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> [it] from מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> the Midianites

וַיֵּרָ֥א <WH7200> appeared אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto him The LORD עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> with גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> [is] with thee thou mighty הֶחָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> man of valour

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> then גִּדְעוֹן֙ <WH1439> And Gideon בִּ֣י <WH994> unto him Oh אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my Lord וְיֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> if יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> us וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why מְצָאַ֖תְנוּ <WH4672> be with us why then is all this befallen כָּל־ <WH3605> has all זֹ֑את <WH2063> to us וְאַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> and where כָֽל־ <WH3605> are all נִפְלְאֹתָ֡יו <WH6381> us? and where [be] all his miracles אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which סִפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> told לָ֨נוּ אֲבוֹתֵ֜ינוּ <WH1> which our fathers לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> us of saying הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> Egypt הֶעֱלָ֣נוּ <WH5927> bring us up יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Did not the LORD וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> henceforth נְטָשָׁ֣נוּ <WH5203> hath forsaken יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖נוּ <WH5414> us and delivered בְּכַף־ <WH3709> us into the hands מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of the Midianites

וַיִּ֤פֶן <WH6437> looked אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> upon him and said לֵ֚ךְ <WH1980> Go בְּכֹחֲךָ֣ <WH3581> in this thy might זֶ֔ה <WH2088> this וְהוֹשַׁעְתָּ֥ <WH3467> and thou shalt save אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel מִכַּ֣ף <WH3709> from the hand מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> of the Midianites הֲלֹ֖א <WH3808> not שְׁלַחְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH7971> have not I sent

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him בִּ֣י <WH994> unto him Oh אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> my Lord בַּמָּ֥ה <WH4100> wherewith אוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <WH3467> shall I save אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold אַלְפִּי֙ <WH504> oxen הַדַּ֣ל <WH1800> [is] poor בִּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> in Manasseh וְאָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> and I הַצָּעִ֖יר <WH6810> and I [am] the least בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> in my father's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> But יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> Surely אֶהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> and you וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <WH5221> unto him Surely I will be with thee and thou shalt smite אֶת־ <WH853> מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> the Midianites כְּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> as one

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אִם־ <WH518> If נָ֛א <WH4994> now מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> unto him If now I have found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> then shew לִּי֙ א֔וֹת <WH226> me a sign שָׁאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> who מְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that thou talkest עִמִּֽי׃ <WH5973> with

אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֨א <WH4994> Please תָמֻ֤שׁ <WH4185> Depart מִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> here עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּאִ֣י <WH935> not hence I pray thee until I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to וְהֹֽצֵאתִי֙ <WH3318> unto thee and bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> מִנְחָתִ֔י <WH4503> my present וְהִנַּחְתִּ֖י <WH3240> and set לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> [it] before וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> thee And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I אֵשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> I will tarry עַ֥ד <WH5704> until שׁוּבֶֽךָ׃ <WH7725> until thou come again

וְגִדְע֣וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon בָּ֗א <WH935> went in וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> and made ready גְּדִֽי־ <WH1423> kid עִזִּים֙ <WH5795> goat וְאֵיפַת־ <WH374> of an ephah קֶ֣מַח <WH7058> of flour מַצּ֔וֹת <WH4682> and unleavened cakes הַבָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> the flesh שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> he put בַּסַּ֔ל <WH5536> in a basket וְהַמָּרַ֖ק <WH4839> the broth שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> and he put בַּפָּר֑וּר <WH6517> in a pot וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> and brought [it] out אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הָאֵלָ֖ה <WH424> unto him under the oak וַיַּגַּֽשׁ׃ <WH5066> and presented ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God קַ֣ח <WH3947> unto him Take אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּשָׂ֤ר <WH1320> the flesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּצּוֹת֙ <WH4682> and the unleavened cakes וְהַנַּח֙ <WH3240> and lay אֶל־ <WH413> about הַסֶּ֣לַע <WH5553> rock הַלָּ֔ז <WH1975> [them] upon this וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּרַ֖ק <WH4839> the broth שְׁפ֑וֹךְ <WH8210> and pour out וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> put forth מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> Then the angel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> קְצֵ֤ה <WH7097> the end הַמִּשְׁעֶ֙נֶת֙ <WH4938> of the staff אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that was בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> that [was] in his hand וַיִּגַּ֥ע <WH5060> and touched בַּבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> the flesh וּבַמַּצּ֑וֹת <WH4682> and the unleavened cakes וַתַּ֨עַל <WH5927> and there rose up הָאֵ֜שׁ <WH784> fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצּ֗וּר <WH6697> out of the rock וַתֹּ֤אכַל <WH398> and consumed אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> the flesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּצּ֔וֹת <WH4682> and the unleavened cakes וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> Then the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> departed מֵעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> out of his sight

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> perceived גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> And when Gideon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD ה֑וּא <WH1931> he ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> Gideon אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> Alas אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> O Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> for כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> for because רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I have seen מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> an angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> face אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנִֽים׃ <WH6440> to face

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said ל֧וֹ יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD שָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> unto him Peace לְךָ֖ אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֑א <WH3372> [be] unto thee fear לֹ֖א <WH3808> shall not תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> not thou shalt not die

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> built שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> there גִּדְע֤וֹן <WH1439> Then Gideon מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> there unto the LORD וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> and called ל֥וֹ יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> is Peace עַ֚ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this עוֹדֶ֕נּוּ <WH5750> is still בְּעָפְרָ֖ת <WH6084> it [is] yet in Ophrah אֲבִ֥י הָעֶזְרִֽי׃ <WH33> of the Abiezrites פ

וַיְהִי֮ <WH1961> become בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> And it came to pass the same night הַהוּא֒ <WH1931> the same וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that the LORD קַ֤ח <WH3947> unto him Take אֶת־ <WH853> פַּר־ <WH6499> young הַשּׁוֹר֙ <WH7794> bullock אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לְאָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father's וּפַ֥ר <WH6499> bullock הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> even the second שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> of seven שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years old וְהָרַסְתָּ֗ <WH2040> and throw down אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> the altar הַבַּ֙עַל֙ <WH1168> of Baal אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לְאָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> that thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <WH842> the grove אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> is beside תִּכְרֹֽת׃ <WH3772> hath and cut down

וּבָנִ֨יתָ <WH1129> And build מִזְבֵּ֜חַ <WH4196> an altar לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God עַ֣ל <WH5921> on רֹ֧אשׁ <WH7218> upon the top הַמָּע֛וֹז <WH4581> of this rock הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this בַּמַּֽעֲרָכָ֑ה <WH4634> in the ordered place וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> and take אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second וְהַעֲלִ֣יתָ <WH5927> and offer עוֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> a burnt sacrifice בַּעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> with the wood הָאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <WH842> of the grove אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תִּכְרֹֽת׃ <WH3772> which thou shalt cut down

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took גִּדְע֜וֹן <WH1439> Then Gideon עֲשָׂרָ֤ה <WH6235> ten אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> men מֵֽעֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <WH6213> and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> and because דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> as יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> as the LORD וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> to him כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and because יָרֵא֩ <WH3372> unto him and [so] it was because he feared אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> household אָבִ֜יו <WH1> his father's וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> and the men הָעִ֛יר <WH5892> of the city מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> that he could not do יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> [it] by day וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> that he did לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> [it] by night

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֜ימוּ <WH7925> arose early אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold נֻתַּץ֙ <WH5422> was cast down מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> behold the altar הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal וְהָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <WH842> and the grove אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> was beside כֹּרָ֑תָה <WH3772> was cut down וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> that [was] by it and the second הֹֽעֲלָ֔ה <WH5927> was offered עַל־ <WH5921> was beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar הַבָּנֽוּי׃ <WH1129> [that was] built

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> to another מִ֥י <WH4310> Who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> Who hath done הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַֽיִּדְרְשׁוּ֙ <WH1875> ask וַיְבַקְשׁ֔וּ <WH1245> and asked וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> they said גִּדְעוֹן֙ <WH1439> Gideon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH3101> of Joash עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> hath done הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city אֶל־ <WH413> unto יוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH3101> unto Joash הוֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> Bring out אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֖ <WH1121> thy son וְיָמֹ֑ת <WH4191> that he may die כִּ֤י <WH3588> and indeed נָתַץ֙ <WH5422> because he hath cast down אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal וְכִ֥י <WH3588> and indeed כָרַ֖ת <WH3772> and because he hath cut down הָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <WH842> the grove אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> was beside

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹאָ֡שׁ <WH3101> And Joash לְכֹל֩ <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָמְד֨וּ <WH5975> unto all that stood עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> against הַאַתֶּ֣ם ׀ <WH859> will you תְּרִיב֣וּן <WH7378> against him Will ye plead לַבַּ֗עַל <WH1168> Baal אִם־ <WH518> or אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> will you תּוֹשִׁיע֣וּן <WH3467> deliver אוֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Whoever יָרִ֥יב <WH7378> him? he that will plead ל֛וֹ יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> for him let him be put to death עַד־ <WH5704> by הַבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> whilst [it is yet] morning אִם־ <WH518> If אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> if he [be] a god הוּא֙ <WH1931> him יָ֣רֶב <WH7378> let him plead ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> because נָתַ֖ץ <WH5422> for himself because [one] hath cast down אֶֽת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֽוֹ׃ <WH4196> his altar

וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> he called ל֥וֹ בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> Therefore on that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> him יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <WH3378> him Jerubbaal לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying יָ֤רֶב <WH7378> plead בּוֹ֙ הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> Let Baal כִּ֥י <WH3588> because נָתַ֖ץ <WH5422> against him because he hath thrown down אֶֽת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֽוֹ׃ <WH4196> his altar פ

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מִדְיָ֧ן <WH4080> Then all the Midianites וַעֲמָלֵ֛ק <WH6002> and the Amalekites וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children קֶ֖דֶם <WH6924> of the east נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <WH622> were gathered יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> and went over וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> in the valley יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> of Jezreel

וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> But the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָבְשָׁ֖ה <WH3847> came אֶת־ <WH853> גִּדְע֑וֹן <WH1439> upon Gideon וַיִּתְקַע֙ <WH8628> and he blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> a trumpet וַיִּזָּעֵ֥ק <WH2199> was gathered אֲבִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH44> and Abiezer אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after

וּמַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> messengers שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> And he sent בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> throughout all Manasseh וַיִּזָּעֵ֥ק <WH2199> who also was gathered גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> after וּמַלְאָכִ֣ים <WH4397> messengers שָׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> him and he sent בְּאָשֵׁ֤ר <WH836> unto Asher וּבִזְבֻלוּן֙ <WH2074> and unto Zebulun וּבְנַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> and unto Naphtali וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> and they came up לִקְרָאתָֽם׃ <WH7125> to meet

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said גִּדְע֖וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> unto God אִם־ <WH518> If יֶשְׁךָ֞ <WH3426> If thou wilt מוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <WH3467> save בְּיָדִ֛י <WH3027> by mine hand אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> as thou hast said

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I מַצִּ֛יג <WH3322> Behold I will put אֶת־ <WH853> גִּזַּ֥ת <WH1492> a fleece הַצֶּ֖מֶר <WH6785> of wool בַּגֹּ֑רֶן <WH1637> in the floor אִ֡ם <WH518> If טַל֩ <WH2919> [and] if the dew יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַגִּזָּ֜ה <WH1492> be on the fleece לְבַדָּ֗הּ <WH905> only וְעַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> upon all the earth חֹ֔רֶב <WH2721> only and [it be] dry וְיָדַעְתִּ֗י <WH3045> [beside] then shall I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that תוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <WH3467> that thou wilt save בְּיָדִ֛י <WH3027> by mine hand אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> as thou hast said

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵ֕ן <WH3651> so וַיַּשְׁכֵּם֙ <WH7925> And it was so for he rose up early מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> on the morrow וַיָּ֖זַר <WH2115> together אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּזָּ֑ה <WH1492> the fleece וַיִּ֤מֶץ <WH4680> and wringed טַל֙ <WH2919> the dew מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּזָּ֔ה <WH1492> out of the fleece מְל֥וֹא <WH4393> full הַסֵּ֖פֶל <WH5602> a bowl מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of water

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said גִּדְעוֹן֙ <WH1439> And Gideon אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto God אַל־ <WH408> nay יִ֤חַר <WH2734> be hot אַפְּךָ֙ <WH639> Let not thine anger בִּ֔י וַאֲדַבְּרָ֖ה <WH1696> against me and I will speak אַ֣ךְ <WH389> also הַפָּ֑עַם <WH6471> but this once אֲנַסֶּ֤ה <WH5254> let me prove נָּא־ <WH4994> please רַק־ <WH7535> but הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <WH6471> I pray thee but this once בַּגִּזָּ֔ה <WH1492> with the fleece יְהִי־ <WH1961> become נָ֨א <WH4994> now חֹ֤רֶב <WH2721> let it now be dry אֶל־ <WH413> on הַגִּזָּה֙ <WH1492> only upon the fleece לְבַדָּ֔הּ <WH905> only וְעַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and upon all the ground יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become טָּֽל׃ <WH2919> let there be dew

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> did אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> And God כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> so that night הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> it was חֹ֤רֶב <WH2721> for it was dry אֶל־ <WH413> on הַגִּזָּה֙ <WH1492> upon the fleece לְבַדָּ֔הּ <WH905> only וְעַל־ <WH5921> was on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> on all the ground הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become טָֽל׃ <WH2919> only and there was dew פ
